matches.text: Anything just leapfrogged Lovable and Bolt in race to vibe app creation!

I tried out Anything Max. 

And its on another level compared to other vibe coding tools. 

Not only does it build frontend, backend, database in one shot. 

It also tests out its own build like a human developer, clicking buttons, scrolling, signing up to find bugs and issues. 

And fixes them on auto pilot.

Anything Max just set a new standard for vibe coding.
Full-stack control, real bug-hunting, autonomous fixes, and apps that actually ship ‚Äî this is what every builder has been waiting for.

Lovable can't do this yet.

We built an AI that opens your app in a real browser, clicks every button, fills every form, watches what breaks and then fixes the code.

Actually uses your app like a human.

Here's what Anything Max can do:

Introducing @anything Max: the vibe-coding beast that‚Äôs miles ahead of Lovable and Bolt.
The accuracy, the design quality, the full-stack control‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs on another level.

People aren‚Äôt just prototyping, they‚Äôre building real products and real revenue.

Maybe I'm biased because I'm from the Bay Area but you can't deny the strides that Anything has made in the last 3 months. 

They are literally providing a full vibe code solution all the way to the app store. 

Concepts are one thing but production is a whole different animal. 

Ever build a nice UI and front end then ask yourself cool what's next ? 

Anything does it for you because they own the entire infrastructure. 

Now with Max you basically have a personal engineer at your side who will actually help you "ship"
